name: Godot Engine Shader File
summary: A SHADER file contains shader properties used by Godot Engine, a free and open-source game engine used to create 2D and 3D games. It stores various data types and functions in the Godot shading language, which is based on the OpenGL ES (GLSL ES) 3.0 shading language. SHADER files are referenced by shader programs in the game for 2D and 3D rendering and particles in the game.
